Name: Processor (PH)
Description: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Maschine stellt aus Nüssen und anderen Objekten, die zerkleinert werden können, mehrere Güter her.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.it: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Эта машина берет орехи и другие измельчаемые предметы и превращает их в различные товары.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This machine takes nuts and other grindable objects and turns them into various goods.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这台机器将坚果和其他可研磨的物体变成各种商品。
